flawed_nl_solution:
Their 1st child was born 15 years ago, and therefore is <<15=15>>15 years old.
Their 2nd child was born 1 year after their 15-year-old child, and therefore is 15-1=<<15-1=14>>14 years old.
Their 3rd child was born 4 years after their 14-year-old child, and therefore is 14-4=15 years old.
Their 4th child was born 2 years after their 15-year-old child, and therefore is 15-2=13 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
